description: Metaphysics concerns what things there are, what they are like, and how they are related. In this course, we will investigate such questions with respect to a special class of objects: us. In particular, we will consider question of what we are. This course will focus exclusively on recent philosophical research within the âanalyticâ tradition.
title: Metaphysics of Human Nature
prerequisite:
None, but it is recommended that students have taken at least one
philosophy elective already.
